name: Raspberry Kush
description: Raspberry Kush is a great-tasting indica strain whose raspberries and cream aroma will keep you coming back for more. This strain will lead to a bit of a body melt, but it can be surprisingly upbeat for an indica. It may leave newer consumers feeling pretty lazy, but many find this Kush to be a creative flower, making it great for music, art, and talking with friends.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Sleepy, Uplifted, Stress, Insomnia, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Anxious
